section.p: Conditions qualifying the Veteran for health care benefits.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for this qualifying reason.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of this qualifying reason.

Contains zero or more [0..*] militaryServiceEpisode, where its type is Military Service Episode
militaryServiceEpisode.

Contains exactly one [1..1] qualifyingCoverageFactor, where its type is Qualifying Coverage Factor
qualifyingCoverageFactor.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for this qualifying reason.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of this qualifying reason.

Contains zero or more [0..*] militaryServiceEpisode, where its type is Military Service Episode
militaryServiceEpisode.

Contains exactly one [1..1] qualifyingCoverageFactor, where its type is Qualifying Coverage Factor
qualifyingCoverageFactor.
